product_overview: GSL Pakistan CRM is an all-in-one customer relationship management system tailored for educational consultancies and coaching services, enabling streamlined student recruitment, visa processing, class and employee management, HR, finance, B2B partnerships, marketing, task coordination, and support in a unified web platform.
core_goals: Streamline student recruitment and visa application workflows
Manage coaching classes including scheduling, attendance, and performance
Automate HR operations such as recruitment, onboarding, leave management
Track and report financial transactions with multi-currency support
Enable B2B SaaS partnerships with controlled access and data isolation
Integrate multi-channel marketing for lead capture and campaign analytics
Facilitate collaboration via task management and internal messaging
Provide real-time dashboards and notifications for informed decision-making
key_features: Real-time centralized dashboard tailored per user role
Comprehensive Study Abroad module managing leads and visa cases
Universities database with detailed profiles and search
Coaching module for student enrollment, teacher schedules, and batch management
Employee attendance and performance tracking with payroll integration
HR module covering recruitment, onboarding, and leave management
Accounts module for financial tracking, invoicing, and reporting
B2B SaaS management for partner agencies with quota and permission control
Multi-channel marketing integration including Facebook, Instagram, Google Forms
Task management with priority, status workflows, and notifications
Support ticketing system with category tracking and SLA management
Internal messenger for real-time team communication
Extensive reports and analytics exportable in various formats
Event calendar integration with scheduling and reminders
User profile and comprehensive user management with role-based permissions
user_flow_summary: User logs in with email/password; session and role-based access are established with a 5-minute idle timeout
Dashboard loads real-time metrics and notifications based on user role
Users access respective modules per their permissions: leads and cases for counselors, financials for accountants, HR tasks for HR staff, etc.
Leads are captured automatically from multiple channels and manually, assigned to counselors for processing
Case and student progress tracked through multi-stage workflows with document uploads and communication logs
Teachers and students manage schedules, attendance, and performance in coaching module
Employees record attendance, time, and leave requests processed via approval workflows
B2B partners submit leads and track quotas with restricted module visibility
Tasks are created, assigned, and updated with notifications and audit trails
Support tickets are raised and managed through resolution stages
Reports generated and exported for varied analytical insights
Users update profiles and admins manage user roles and statuses system-wide
validation_criteria: Authentication and RBAC enforce correct module access per user role
Session management triggers logout after 5 minutes of inactivity
Lead capture and import functionality integrates correctly with external APIs
Multi-stage workflows for leads, cases, and onboarding process correctly with status updates
Document uploads are stored securely with access policies enforced
Financial transactions and multi-currency handling are accurate and reports generate correctly
Notifications and real-time features deliver updates within 100ms latency
Task and ticket status workflows are consistent and notify relevant users
Data encryption and RLS ensure data privacy and secure access
UI responsiveness and accessibility comply with mobile-first and WCAG 2.1 standards
System scales to support 500+ concurrent users and 100,000+ records without degradation
Backup and recovery processes maintain 99.9% uptime and data integrity
Audit logs capture user actions with timestamps and details for traceability
